thread.section_title: Yahoo! Finance: Property Management Industry News
thread.title: BBX Capital posts 2Q profit

title: BBX Capital posts 2Q profit
text:
BBX Capital posts 2Q profit BBX Capital posts profit of $4.1 million in second quarter 28 minutes ago 
FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. (AP) _ BBX Capital Corp. (BBX) on Thursday reported second-quarter profit of $4.1 million. 
The Fort Lauderdale, Florida-based company said it had profit of 25 cents per share. 
The real estate investment firm posted revenue of $38.6 million in the period. 
BBX Capital shares have declined slightly since the beginning of the year. The stock has declined 12 percent in the last 12 months.
